title: Short-Term Device Leasing
intro: In today's dynamic workforce environment, businesses are increasingly seeking flexible solutions to provide the latest smartphones to non-permanent employees, without the burden of full device ownership costs.
programHighlight: The Short-Term Device Leasing Program from Evergreen Wireless offers an innovative alternative, allowing businesses to lease CPO Device Bundles for a fixed term providing the ultimate financial flexibility.
pricing: With fixed costs from $50.00 per month, and leasing terms from 6-months, this solution provides the advantage of having the latest technology with a predictable monthly expense, while eliminating upfront costs.
downloadHeading: Download our Device Leasing Program Overview
downloadDescription: Get a complete look at program details, pricing examples, and onboarding steps.
partnerIntro: Evergreen Wireless has partnered with one of North America's largest independent technology and equipment financing companies, to bring Canadian companies financial flexibility and options for purchasing mobile device products and solutions.
salesSupport: Our sales team will be able to provide you with an overview of options that minimize risk and maximize your investment.
